entry.title: Ten ways to be average
entry.summary:
10 Common Characteristics of Average People writes:

There are plenty of resources online if you want to learn how to be successful, but what about those who are only looking to achieve adequacy? If youâ€™re shooting for the big dog pile at the bottom, here are 10 common characteristics of average people to aim for:

Ugh, I'm very guilty for a couple of these.
